Translations.Text: Arau yetiya sinata phum diya ha’ba, tetiya'i sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i nija pratipalakara pine daurai guci ahiba
Sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! Kone amaka amara nidraasthalara paraa uthale? Dayamaya allahe iyarae'i pratisrauti dichila arau raachulasakale'o satyahe kaichila’
E'ito ha’ba kerala eta bikata sabda; tetiya'i ihamta sakaloke upasthita karaa ha’ba amara sanmukhata
eteke aji karao prati an'yaya karaa nahaba arau tomaloke yi karaichila kerala tarae'i pratiphala diya ha’ba
Niscaya jannatabasisakala aji anandata magna thakiba
te'omloke arau te'omlokara straisakala susitala chamra talata susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba
Tata thakiba te'omlokara babe phalamula, arau te'omloke yito bicaraiba se'itorae'i paba
asima dayalu pratipalakara taraphara paraa koraa ha’ba ‘chalama’ (abhinandana ba niraapatta)
Arau ‘he aparaadhisakala! Tomaloke aji prthaka hai yoraa’
He adama santana! Ma'i tomalokaka e'i marme nirdesa diya nachilone ye, tomaloke cayatanara ibadata nakaraiba, karana si tomalokara prakasya satrau
arau kerala morae'i ibadata karaa, e'itorae'i sarala patha
Arau cayatane tomalokara bahu dalaka bibhraanta karaichila, tathapi'o tomaloke anudharana karaa na'ine
e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yara pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila
Tomaloke ye kupharai karaichila tara babe aji tomaloke iyata dagdha horaa
Aji ami sihamtara mukhata mohara marai dima, sihamtara hate amara lagata katha patiba arau sihamtara bharaiye saksya diba sihamtara krtakarmara
Arau ami iccha karaile arasye sihamtara cakuboraka lopa karai dilohemtena, tetiya sihamte patha anbesanata dauraile'o (kono kamata nahiba) karana kenekaino dekha paba
arau ami iccha karaile sihamtara nija nija sthanata sihamtara akrti paraibartana karai dilohemtena, phalata sihamte aguraa'iyo yaba noraarailehemtena arau ubhati'o ahiba noraarailehemtena
